By Harrabcat on Friday, April 9, 2004 - 04:50 pm:

I find medals at Promiass.. Sometimes off of RANDOM monsters and a few scattered throughout. Kawrea.. Alot of times on the 10th floor but have found medals on other floors besides the tenth. Togle+ I find medals off of RANDOM monsters and sometime on the last few floors. Kalaragi+ Scattered throughout and on random monsters. Promiass+ Scattered throughout and on random monsters.. Kawrea+... Ech I don't even go there.

Of all the places i have been i have gotten medals on the + adventures the most but then again I don't really go on the regular adventures anymore.

Hope this helps
